excerpt: The TMCM-6214 is a 6-axes motor controller/driver board for 2-phase bipolar stepper motors with up-to 2A RMS motor current and+24V nom. supply.The motion controllers support SixPoint™ ramps in addition to linear ramps in hardware. 3 encoder inputs for incremental a/b/n encoders are included.For communication either CAN, RS485, RS232 or USB may be selected. In addition, there are 6 general purpose digital inputs, 2 analog inputs and 8 general purpose outputs (protected). Two STO inputs are available together with an intergated power supply switch for the driver supply.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial FeaturesDcStep™velocity modeCoolStep™passive brakingSpreadCycle™Stall detectionStallGuard2™StealthChop2™
